name: Run for Love
description:
This is a 3D platformer with dating sim elements made for Ludum Dare 41 (Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres). We thought this mashup would be nice and weird. It's a very short game - you won't need longer than 5 minutes for one playtrough. Enjoy! :D

PS: First time 3D and first Ludum Dare for us :)

You can visit our homepage if you want to or check out Twitter! ^o^
